section.title: EVMGetPolicy
section.para: EVMGetPolicy returns all the attributes of a policy.

listitem.para: Input: The name attribute of a policy.
Output: The policy is returned with other attributes of the policy.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMGetPolicy usage:
